instructions: Go to Settings > Accessibility. Tap RTT/TTY or TTY, then do any of the following: If your iPhone has Dual SIM, choose a line. Turn on Software RTT/TTY or Software TTY. Tap Relay Number, then enter the phone number to use for relay calls using Software RTT/TTY. Turn on Send Immediately to send each character as you type. Turn off to complete messages before sending. Turn on Answer All Calls as RTT/TTY. Turn on Hardware TTY. When RTT or TTY is turned on, the TTY icon appears in the status bar at the top of the screen.

In the Phone app, choose a contact, then tap the phone number. Choose RTT/TTY Call or RTT/TTY Relay Call. Wait for the call to connect, then tap RTT/TTY. iPhone defaults to the RTT protocol whenever it s supported by the carrier.

Enter your message in the text field. If you turned on Send Immediately in Settings, your recipient sees each character as you type. Otherwise, tap the Send button to send the message. To also transmit audio, tap the Microphone button .
In the Phone app, tap Recents. RTT and TTY calls have the RTT/TTY icon next to them. Next to the call you want to review, tap the More Info button .
